contents.text: Welcome to TechSoup in San Francisco, a global network bridging technology solutions and services for good.
For development agency services and program support, press 1.
For custom software development and integration, press 1.
Please hold the line while we connect you to our software development specialists.

navigationGoals: Set up a custom integration between our fundraising platform and TechSoup’s API.
I need to discuss developing a custom mobile app to connect veterans with community resources.
Discuss designing a microservices-based application and integrating third-party APIs for our nonprofit platform.
I need help setting up a custom software integration for our senior center's volunteer tracking.
I need custom software built for a student-led science outreach project.

contents.text: For training and capacity building programs, press 2.
Please hold the line while we connect you to our training and development team.

navigationGoals: Schedule an online training session for my team on the new donor management software.
I want to enroll my nonprofit veteran outreach organization in a digital skills training program.
Request advanced training on cloud infrastructure deployment and cybersecurity risk mitigation for our IT team.
I'd like to sign up for training on using nonprofit management tools.
I’m looking for training on open-source data analysis tools for non-profits.

contents.text: For partnership and grant inquiries, press 2.
For collaboration and strategic partnerships, press 1.
Please hold the line while we connect you to our partnerships team.

navigationGoals: Discuss a strategic partnership to co-host a technology conference for nonprofits.
I’d like to explore a strategic partnership to expand my veteran mentoring initiative.
Explore a strategic partnership to co-develop an open-source data analytics platform for nonprofits.
I want to talk about partnering with TechSoup on community tech programs.
I’d like to explore a strategic partnership between my university sci-tech club and TechSoup.

contents.text: For non-profit technology grants and donations, press 2.
Please hold the line while we connect you to our grants and donations specialists.

navigationGoals: Apply for a technology grant to upgrade our nonprofit’s computer lab.
I’m looking to apply for a technology grant to fund laptops for veterans transitioning back to civilian life.
Apply for a technology grant to fund VMware licenses and server hardware for our nonprofit.
I need information on applying for technology grants for our nonprofit.
I want guidance on applying for technology grants for my student-run non-profit.
